title: Creation config YAML schema
description: YAML schema for creation configuration file of OMTool

output_file.description: Path to the file where the output model would be saved.

overwrite.description: Should the program overwrite model file if it already exists or not.

handler_type.description: Type of handler that processes the logging message.

objects.description: List of objects that would be added to model.

mass.description: Mass of the object if its type is 'body'. Should be denoted with !q tag.

position.description: Initial position of the system. Should be denoted with !q tag.

velocity.description: Initial velocity of the system. Should be denoted with !q tag.

path.description: Path to the file with model if its type is 'csv'.

delimeter.description: Delimeter thet would be used when reading the csv file.
